text: Ni-farmoytiitik Hebelt√¥ farmoyta maruubinnino Yallih idinih Sinam kay amri oggoltamkeh iyyaanam akke waytek, diggah Nabiyow tama munaafiqhiin atu keenih abte meklah cinimit sinni nafsi yudlumen waqdi, tokkel usun Yalli dambi keenih cabam esserak kol yemeeteeniih Yallih farmoyti dambi cabti keenih esserinnay Yalli isi naqoosak kaxxam toobat oggolaah xuwaw lih yan Rabbih kaa geyak yenen
